eventDecorators.name: FinanceSet
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal.

eventDecorators.name: IdSponsorshipsClaimed
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal.

eventDecorators.name: IdSponsorshipsPurchased
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal.

eventDecorators.name: PriceSet
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal.

eventDecorators.name: PurchaseTokenSet
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal.

eventDecorators.name: ReclaimedTokens
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a vote has been cast on a proposal.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: reclaimTokens
functionDecorators.description: Reclaim tokens of the specified type sent to the smart contract. Reclaim the specified type of ERC20 tokens sent to the smart contract. Tokens will be deposited into the finance app set with setFinance().

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: setFinance
functionDecorators.description: Set the DAO finance app address where deposited or reclaimed tokens will go.

parameterDecorators.name: _finance
parameterDecorators.description: The DAO's finance app with a deposit() function.

functionDecorators.name: setPrice
functionDecorators.description: Set the price per Sponsorship. Set the price per Sponsorship.

functionDecorators.name: setPurchaseToken
functionDecorators.description: Set the ERC20 token used as payment for IdSponsorships. Set the ERC20 token used as payment for IdSponsorships.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
